notes: Spacious, well-maintained luxury apartment with open-concept living and dining areas, modern open kitchen with stone countertops, recessed lighting, and large floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors to a balcony with plants. Excellent natural light throughout. For baby safety, the balcony has railings but access through sliding doors should be monitored; furniture has some sharp corners on the dining table and TV stand that may need padding. Very clean condition with quality finishes.
